data.description:
Insight is a Fortune 500 Solutions Integrator that focuses on helping businesses transform their cloud, data, AI, cybersecurity, and analytics capabilities. The Associate Product Manager Intern will support product managers in developing go-to-market strategies, maintaining content, and improving device lifecycle services.


Responsibilities

  • Help coordinate with cross-functional teams including Sales, Marketing, Delivery, Operations, Finance, and Legal for smooth rollout and operationalization of new solutions
  • Assist with the coordination and development of sales enablement content
  • Participate in the collection and analysis of customer feedback to identify immediate actions and areas for improvement

Skills

  • Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Business, Marketing, or a related field
  • Must be a rising senior (Graduation date of December 2026 OR May 2027)
  • Strong interest in technology with a “intrapreneur” attitude
  • Strong technical aptitude and curiosity; ability to learn and adapt quickly
  • Ability to work independently and leverage technology for research
  • Strong communication skills and cultural fit with a collaborative, team-oriented environment
  • Organizational skills with attention to detail in content maintenance and process execution
  • Familiarity with Unified Endpoint Management (UEM) concepts is a plus

Benefits

  • Medical benefits
  • Sick time after 90 days
  • Access to our retirement plans

Company Overview

  • Insight dedicated to making the impossible possible combining cutting-edge technology. It was founded in 1988, and is headquartered in Chandler, Arizona, USA, with a workforce of 10001+ employees. Its website is https://www.insight.com.

    • Company H1B Sponsorship

  • Insight has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships, with 1 in 2024, 1 in 2022, 1 in 2020. Please note that this does not guarantee sponsorship for this specific role.
